about_the_game:
Get ready for an adventure in this fast-paced bullet hell game!

With randomly generated levels and endless mode, you'll never play the same level twice in Blockrunner. Each playthrough is a new adventure, filled with unique challenges and surprises.

Dodge obstacles and fight challenging bosses with quirky names, pushing your skills to the limit as you strive to beat your high score or finally defeat that one boss you've been stuck on for a while.

Fight many odd-looking bosses!

The Boomer



You never know what's coming next, as unexpected events can occur anytime. Plus, with randomized* boss stats, you'll always have to stay on your toes and adapt to new challenges.


The vibrant/and old-style graphics will keep you engaged and immersed in the world of Blockrunner. Each level is crafted to provide a visually stimulating and audibly enriching experience.

Join the community and stay updated!

We are actively developing Blockrunner and plan to release regular updates with new features, levels, and improvements. Join our community to share your feedback, see sneak peeks of upcoming content, and participate in discussions with other players.

What does the game have to offer?

- Endless mode for infinite replayability
- Levels with odd-looking bosses
- A leveling and upgrading system for your player and guns
- Customizable player skins
- Dungeon mode: Battle bosses from the past, now more formidable than ever
- And much more coming soon!


What are you waiting for? Add Blockrunner to your wishlist now and join the adventure!

name: BlockRunner : The BlockSide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card with 1 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These might change as the game develops.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card with 1 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These might change as the game develops.
